A

AbstractBumpTask - Class in com.github.tagc.semver.tasks
Abstract class for tasks that perform bumps on the version data represented by a project's version data file.

Constructs an AbstractBumpTask that will bump the current version by bumpCategory when executed.

An abstract class that provides default behaviour for concrete instances of ProjectVersionSelectorStrategy.

V

Version - Interface in com.github.tagc.semver.version
Represents a semantic version number for a project.
Version.Category - Enum in com.github.tagc.semver.version
Version category enumeration - enumerates the major, minor and patch segments of version strings.
VersionFactory - Class in com.github.tagc.semver.version
A factory for producing base and decorated Version objects.
VersionSelectionData - Class in com.github.tagc.semver.projectstrategy
A class for producing immutable objects that capture the information required by instances of ProjectVersionSelectionStrategy to choose which Version to select for the project that this plugin is applied to.
VersionSelectionData(Project, Version, Category) - Constructor in VersionSelectionData
VersionSelectionManager - Class in com.github.tagc.semver.projectstrategy
Manages the selection of an instance of Version to set as the version of the project that this plugin is applied to by delegating the responsibility to a chain of ProjectVersionSelectionStrategy instances.
